meanings.definition: A smell, especially a pleasant or distinctive one.
meanings.sent1: The fresh odor of flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: I love the odor of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The odor of popcorn in the cinema made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The odor of success lingered in the air after the team won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The sweet odor of pine trees in the forest was enchanting.

meanings.definition: A distinctive smell, especially an unpleasant one.
meanings.sent1: The foul odor coming from the garbage can was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The odor of rotten eggs made me gag.
meanings.sent3: The odor of burnt toast set off the fire alarm in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The odor of failure hung heavy in the air after the experiment went wrong.
meanings.sent5: The pungent odor of vinegar filled the room when the bottle broke.
